Package nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze.tiles

Class DecayTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze.Icon
      • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze.tiles.Tile
        • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze.tiles.AccessibleTile
          • nz.ac.vuw.ecs.swen225.gp20.maze.tiles.DecayTile
  • public class DecayTile
extends AccessibleTile
    Represents a tile that decays each time Chap walks out of it, becomes a WallTile when Chap walks over it enough times.
